intension: Design a flyer to promote a Thanksgiving pumpkin sale offering a 30% discount.
globalcaption: The image features a table with a variety of pumpkins and pumpkin seeds. There are three pumpkins on the table, with one placed in the center and the other two positioned closer to the edges. The pumpkins are surrounded by several pumpkin seeds, which are scattered around the table. The scene is set against an orange background, which complements the vibrant colors of the pumpkins and seeds.
keywords: autumn, celebration, dinner, fall, holiday, pumpkin, seasonal, thanksgiving, orange, thanksgiving day, thankful, flyer, sale, discount

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a large, bright orange circle with a white line running through the center. The circle is positioned in the center of the image, and the white line appears to be a horizontal line. The orange color of the circle is quite vibrant, making it the focal point of the image

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a table with a variety of pumpkins and squash arranged on it. There are three pumpkins, with one placed on the left side, another in the center, and the third on the right side of the table. In addition to the pumpkins, there are two squash, one located in the middle of the table and the other on the right side. \n\nA couple of spoons are also present on the table, with one placed near the center and the other on the right side. The table is set against a backdrop of a pumpkin patch, creating a festive and seasonal atmosphere
